CREATE TABLE "${tableName}" ( "dataid" varchar(255) COLLATE "pg_catalog"."default", "visitno" varchar(255) COLLATE "pg_catalog"."default", "WBC" float8, "NEUT_num" float8, "LYMPH_num" float8, "nationname" varchar(255) COLLATE "pg_catalog"."default", "maritalstatuscode" int4, "maritalstatusname" varchar(255) COLLATE "pg_catalog"."default", "occupationcategorycode" int4, mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${tableName} WHERE "${featureName}" BETWEEN '${start}' AND '${end}';
